title: justice league font
content:
this could very well be hand drawn, but would any of you guys know of a similar font to the classic justice league logo?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2002065968585332844_rs_5465.jpg)
author: lizthiem

comments.content: Reminded me of Armada (Font Bureau) too. But the G here has a spur.
